name: Overnight Drive
description:
Overnight Drive is a customisable, animated screensaver that allows you to affect various audio and visual aspects, like the current weather or the amount of traffic on the road. You can also tinker a bit with the radio!

While i'm not currently working on the project, there are a few more things i'd like to add! These include different environments, and a variety of music snippets for the radio, and the option for naturally varying weather.

Links to sources of all of the sound effects used, along with credit to thier original composer can be found in the credits menu. 

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated, thank you!
